projects.title: Password Generator
projects.desc: A generator that give you a random password based on criteria that you confirmed.

projects.title: Code Quiz
projects.desc: A quiz that helps you practice Javascript fundamentals.

projects.title: Ecommerce Backend
projects.desc: A back-end ecommerce application for a retail company.

projects.title: Employee Tracker
projects.desc: A directory created to keep track of your employees.

projects.title: Social Network API
projects.desc: An API for a social network web application where users can share their thoughts, react to friends thoughts, and create a friend list.

projects.title: Work Day Scheduler
projects.desc: A scheduling application to help organize your day.

projects.title: The Tech Blog
projects.desc: A blog where you can sign up, post, and comment on discussions about all tech related things.

projects.desc: A note taking tool that uses: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and Express.js.

projects.title: Budget Tracker
projects.desc: A budget tracker that allows the user to add expenses and deposits to their budget with or without a connection.

projects.title: Kanye Guess
projects.desc: Kanye Guess is a quiz game in which users are given a famous quote and must decide within ten seconds if Kanye West said it or someone else. Players can add their initials at the end to display in the highscore rankings Hall Of Fame.

projects.title: Rate My Dog
projects.desc: Rate My Dog is a full stack application that allows authorized users to log-in/sign-up, rate and comment on their favorite ugly dogs.
